prompts: Create an electric-type Pokemon with fluffy blue fur and a cheerful expression.
Imagine a small, playful creature that can climb trees and loves berries.
Show me a Pokemon that has a bushy tail and bright eyes, perfect for urban adventures.
Generate a cute critter that uses electricity in battles and has a vibrant color scheme.
Design a friendly Pokemon that thrives in forests, always smiling and looking for fun.
Give me a Pokemon with a round body, sparkly tail, and a knack for agility.
Make a character that embodies happiness and energy, perfect for a kids' show.
